pullrequest.title: All pose messages are sent out in a single message every iteration

content.raw:
There's a patch in cc37357 with the changes I propose. This changes the output of `gztopic bw /gazebo/default/physics/contacts` during the fire_hose.world from
~~~
Total[3.72 MB] Mean[0.00 MB] Min[0.00 MB] Max[0.01 MB] Messages[183]
Total[3.84 MB] Mean[0.00 MB] Min[0.00 MB] Max[0.01 MB] Messages[121]
Total[3.64 MB] Mean[0.00 MB] Min[0.00 MB] Max[0.01 MB] Messages[182]
~~~
to
~~~
Total[3.66 MBps] Mean[3.06 KB] Min[0.01 KB] Max[5.17 KB] Messages[184]
Total[3.88 MBps] Mean[2.91 KB] Min[0.01 KB] Max[5.17 KB] Messages[123]
Total[3.51 MBps] Mean[2.99 KB] Min[0.01 KB] Max[5.17 KB] Messages[181]
~~~
